name: Woof (NaSolid)
description:
The goal of the game is to befriend a dog by interacting with it and winning the small mini-game that comes from your decision.

Controls:

- Mouse to select options
- Arrows to move the dog when applicable
- Space bar to do an action when applicable

The game was made by a team of 3 in two days (even if the jam length was way longer):
Programmers: Hans and Nicolas
Art: Janko

Unsure if we will do something with this project in the long run, we have a ton of random ideas we want to try in future jams ;)
